Does your insurance programme provide a full scope of cover from a business context through to your marine requirements?

At Marine Insure, we saw the need to establish a dedicated unit to cater to all your insurance requirements.

What is Marine Insurance

Marine Industry Combined Insurance Packages:
Marine Insure have access to a number of Marine specialist insurers, offering tailored risk solutions and packages for the Marine Industry. Our Advisers work closely with you and the Insurers to negotiate a broad level broad coverage for both your land and floating assets, as well as all your liability requirements. Such as Public and Products including options for Pollution Liability, Marina Operators, Boat/Ship Repairers and Boat Builders’ Liabilities, Protection & Indemnity Insurance (P&I) and more.

What is unique about our Marine Insurance Products?
Marine Insure offers risk management advice and recommendations, whilst working closely with our clients and the insurers to deliver a comprehensive level of cover, specific to each business needs and requirements.

Marine Service Providers within our appetite but not limited to:

  • Marinas
  • Boat Builders
  • Boat and Ship Repairers
  • Marine Mechanics & Electricians
  • Marine Dealers
  • Charter Vessel Operators
  • Barges, Tugs and Work Boats
  • High Valued Pleasure Craft
  • Naval Architects
  • Marine Surveyors and Adjusters

 

What options are available if my business does not fit within the risk profile of the mentioned Marine Services?
Marine Insure offers an extensive range of specialist products for risks that may fall outside the scope of the listed range.

Whether you are a sole operator or a large business concern, we can help you. Marine Insure not only specialises in Marine Insurance products but can also assist you with your general business insurance needs.

How can I obtain a quote?
Contact us on 07 2142 0355 to speak to one of our Authorised Representatives to find out how Marine Insure can assist you.

Contact us to find out how Marine Insure can assist you.

Marine Insure is a member of the Boating Industry Association.
